Email Body:
I was looking at your site and noticed how you compete with other entrepreneurial firms for client representation. We built an AI agent that automates candidate sourcing and client communication, saving your team time on administrative tasks. Mind if I send over a 30-second video demo?

Best, Krykos Team
Hypothesis: CPI can optimize its candidate sourcing and client communication processes through automation, allowing the team to focus more on high-skill tasks such as strategic advising and recruitment.
Pain Points: Competing with other entrepreneurial firms seeking to represent clients

Email Body:
I was looking at your site and noticed the challenge of managing recruitment across multiple offices and markets.
We built an AI agent that automates exactly this, saving significant time on job listings and candidate sourcing.
Mind if I send over a 30-second video demo?

Best, Krykos Team
Hypothesis: 24 Seven Talant can leverage Kry Kos automation tools to streamline job listing management, candidate sourcing, and client communication processes. This would enhance efficiency and allow the agency to focus on higher-value tasks such as consultative recruitment and building relationships with clients.
Pain Points: Expanding recruitment presence in new markets, Managing a large network of offices and staff, Competing with other recruitment agencies for top talent
